# Explore The City - AI Information File

## Website Overview
Explore The City (explorethecity.in) is a comprehensive travel guide for exploring cities across India. We provide detailed information about tourist destinations, attractions, food, budget planning, and travel tips.

## Purpose
To help travelers discover and plan trips to India's most beautiful cities with authentic, detailed travel guides and practical information.

## Main Content Areas

### Cities Directory (/cities)
- Comprehensive guides for major Indian cities
- Each city includes: attractions, food scene, best time to visit, budget estimates, travel tips, and hidden gems
- Cities covered include major tourist destinations across India

### Blog (/blog)
Travel stories, tips, and guides organized by categories:
- Budget Travel
- Cultural Travel
- Festivals
- Food & Culture
- Travel Guide
- Weekend Trips

### Static Pages
- About Us (/about) - Information about our mission and team
- Contact (/contact) - Get in touch with us
- Privacy Policy (/privacy-policy) - Data protection information
- Terms & Conditions (/terms) - Legal information

## Key Features
1. Detailed city guides with practical information
2. Budget estimates for different travel styles
3. Seasonal travel recommendations
4. Local food and cuisine guides
5. Off-the-beaten-path recommendations
6. Cultural insights and local customs
7. Transportation and safety tips

## Content Structure
Each city guide includes:
- Overview and description
- Top attractions (with entry fees and timings where applicable)
- Best time to visit (season-wise breakdown)
- Local food and dining recommendations
- Hidden gems and secret spots
- Essential travel tips
- Budget breakdown (accommodation, food, transport, activities)

## Target Audience
- Domestic travelers exploring India
- International tourists visiting India
- Budget travelers and backpackers
- Cultural enthusiasts
- Food lovers
- Weekend trip planners
- Solo travelers, families, and groups

## Geographic Focus
Primary focus on Indian cities across states including:
- Major metropolitan areas
- Historical and cultural destinations
- Coastal and hill stations
- Pilgrimage sites
- Emerging tourist destinations

## Content Guidelines
- All information is practical and actionable
- Focus on authentic local experiences
- Budget-friendly options highlighted
- Safety and responsible travel emphasized
- Cultural sensitivity maintained
- Up-to-date information (2025)

## API Endpoints
- /api/* - Internal API routes (not for public access)

## Sitemap
Available at: https://www.explorethecity.in/sitemap.xml

## Social Media
Twitter: @explorethecity

## Last Updated
2025
